channel.title: ===}- need help with some thing on my server ( lunarscape pks ) -{===
channel.description:
Hello i need some help wityh my soruce i have made over 19 servers but this is first to not have some skillz not working so if you would help please post here, i also own a server on server staus page ( ())-lunarscape pks-(() ) and i realy need these fixed. thanks ( sorry if wrong section please point me to right one ).
1- skillz
- mineing ( emote id as well ) - firemaking ( emote id as well ) - herblore ( emote id as well ) - agilty ( emote id as well ) - crafting ( emote id as well )
2- pots - super str ( 1-4 ) - super att ( 1-4 ) - super def ( 1-4 ) - magic pot ( 1-4 ) - range pot ( 1-4 ) - prayer pot ( 1-4 )
3- safezones - need to know how to add safe zones
4- portals ( DONE ) - make portal member - make portal admin - make portal mod
5- items ( fix ) - fix items - so skill hood not go as weapon or cape as weapon - or hat as weapon stuff like that
6- npc tele - how npc teles you to places - or chest teles you to somewere - or get a key to work orr item on box or chest
thanks i ownd u i

item.dc:creator: @i_ownd_u_i i ownd u i
item.description:
@i_ownd_u_i wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:197129”]LOL

and this guy has written 19 servers?

Maybe he will get run over by an articulated HGV…[/quote]

stfu noob i only need skillz fixed and pots fixed realy others i need aded so go get run over gay fucking nerd!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2008, 07:08:37 AM[/size][hr][quote=“primadude, post:2, topic:197127”]Portals here for you.

case 7319: // Adminportal
if(playerRights >= 2)
teleportToX = ****;
teleportToY = ****;
sendMessage("You Teleport To The Admin Zone.");
if(playerRights <= 0)
sendMessage("You have to be An admin to enter this portal!");
break;
case 2465: // Modportal
if(playerRights >= 1)
teleportToX = ****;
teleportToY = ****;
sendMessage("You Teleport To The Mod Zone.");
if(playerRights <= 0)
sendMessage("You have to be A Mod to enter this portal!");
break;

case 2474: // Membersportal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = ****; teleportToY = ****; sendMessage("You Teleport To The Member Zone."); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("You have to be A Member to enter this portal!"); break; [/quote]
thanks m8 it helped

item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Portals here for you.

case 7319: // Adminportal
if(playerRights >= 2)
teleportToX = ****;
teleportToY = ****;
sendMessage("You Teleport To The Admin Zone.");
if(playerRights <= 0)
sendMessage("You have to be An admin to enter this portal!");
break;
case 2465: // Modportal
if(playerRights >= 1)
teleportToX = ****;
teleportToY = ****;
sendMessage("You Teleport To The Mod Zone.");
if(playerRights <= 0)
sendMessage("You have to be A Mod to enter this portal!");
break;
case 2474: // Membersportal
if(playerIsMember == 1)
teleportToX = ****;
teleportToY = ****;
sendMessage("You Teleport To The Member Zone.");
if(playerIsMember == 0)
sendMessage("You have to be A Member to enter this portal!");
break;
